Package sample.model.rules.misc.turmites

Class Neighbourhood

java.lang.Object
sample.model.rules.misc.turmites.Neighbourhood
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hexagonal, Triangular, VonNeumann
public abstract class Neighbourhood
extends java.lang.Object
The base class for various turmite neighbourhoods
